column4: What is the best way for me to be able to continue my gnome session from a windows machine(with all of its open programs). I already have ssh set up, and xming on the windows machine.
nx worked well for me (clients for win, osx and ubuntu)
just "sudo dpkg -i package.deb" might do it
Thanks, it installed them now. I'll test it on the windows box soon. Gotta run now.
